# Reference Documentation

API references, schemas, technical contracts, and installation guides.

## Contents

### API & Integration
- **API-Reference.md** - Complete API reference for library usage
- **Integration-Contract.md** - Integration requirements and contracts
- **Manifest-Workflow.md** - Artifact manifest specification and workflow
- **artifact-manifest-v1.0.schema.json** - JSON schema for artifact manifests

### Installation & Dependencies
- **INSTALLATION.md** - Fedora-specific installation guide
- **DEPENDENCIES.md** - Complete dependencies guide (system & Python)

### Integrations
- **HYPERCTL_INTEGRATION.md** - hyperctl/hypersdk integration guide

## See Also

- [../02-Installation.md](../02-Installation.md) - General installation guide (all platforms)
- [../08-Library-API.md](../08-Library-API.md) - Library API guide
